name: saka-key
description: A keyboard interface to the web

scripts.build: echo "You must specify the target browser (firefox or chrome). Example: npm run build:firefox"
scripts.build:prod: echo "You must specify the target browser (firefox or chrome). Example: npm run build:firefox:prod"
scripts.build:chrome:prod: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env=prod:chrome:nobenchmark --progress --colors && npm run zip-dist-chrome
scripts.build:firefox:prod: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env=prod:firefox:nobenchmark --progress --colors && npm run zip-dist-firefox
scripts.build:firefox:beta: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env=prod:firefox:nobenchmark:firefoxBeta --progress --colors && npm run zip-dist-firefox
scripts.build:chrome:benchmark: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env=prod:chrome:benchmark --progress --colors && npm run zip-dist-chrome
scripts.build:firefox:benchmark: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --env=prod:firefox:benchmark --progress --colors && npm run zip-dist-firefox
